description: This file defines the NotesRepository class which provides an interface for interacting with a notes database hosted via Supabase. It includes functions for retrieving, adding, updating, deleting, and searching notes, utilizing the Ktor HTTP client with coroutine support.

classes.name: NotesRepository
classes.description: A class providing CRUD operations and search capabilities for notes through REST API calls to a Supabase backend.

methods.name: getNotes
methods.description: Retrieves all notes from the database, ordered by ID descending.

methods.name: addNote
methods.description: Adds a new note with a given title and content, returning the created Note object.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by ID with new title and content. Returns true if the update was successful.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note identified by ID, returning true if deletion succeeded.

methods.name: searchNotes
methods.description: Searches for notes containing the search term in either title or content.
